text: Kuma aka aza littafin ayyuka, sai ka ga masu laifi suna masu jin tsoro daga abin da ke cikinsa, kuma suna cewa "Kaitonmu! Mene ne ga wannan littafi, ba ya barin ƙarama, kuma ba ya barin babba, face ya ƙididdige ta?" Kuma suka sami abin da suka aikata halarce. Kuma Ubangijinka ba Ya zaluntar kowa
